cause.description:
Our vision: Every church has a team of volonteers of Internet-ministry, who are activly share their faith in Jesus in the power of the Holy Spirit, inviting other people to join this miistry.
Our Goals: Reaching out and build relationships through internet (blogs, chats, forums and etc.)
Reaching teh nations where the preaching of the Gospel is prohibited (Tadjikistan, Uzbekistan and etc.)
1. Everyone has to hear the Gospel presentations even if he spends most of his time in the internet
2. Interenet allows people be more open and speak more openly about spiritual issues
